title: The Blush
description: Amongst the characters in this collection of short stories are the upright Mrs Allen, who unwittingly provides an alibi for her slackly corseted home help, and Emily, who has written fluent, amusing letters to a distinguished novelist for 10 years but descends into small talk when they meet.Contents:The AmbushThe BlushThe Letter-writersA Troubled State of MindThe True PrimitiveThe Rose, the Mauve, the WhiteSummer SchoolsPerhaps a Family FailingGood-bye, Good-byePoor GirlHare ParkYou'll Enjoy It When You Get There
author: Elizabeth Taylor
